title: CIL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Senior Advisor Posts
description: The Coal India Limited (CIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Senior Advisor Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Any degree, Post-graduation, and M.E./M. Tech can apply for the CIL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
